extension_description.message: Enable smart referers everywhere (send referer only on same domain)

menu_options.description: The label of the menu item for opening the extension's preference page

options_enable_label.description: Label of the options page checkbox that enables or disables all of the extension's functionality

options_icon_color_mode_label.description: Label of the options selection of different sources for the icon line color

options_icon_color_mode_description.message: The selected color value will only be used when no compatible theme is active.
options_icon_color_mode_description.description: Extra information for the options selection of different sources for the icon line color

options_icon_color_mode_system.description: Options selection for deducing the icon line color based on the current system theme

options_icon_color_mode_default.description: Options selection for using the icon line color based on the Mozilla default themes – note that these are *not* the themes used by default in most installations

options_icon_color_mode_custom.description: Options selection for using the icon line color value set using the color selector placed after this message

options_strict_label.description: Label of the options page checkbox that toggles whether different sub-domains of the same base domain will be considered the same host or not

options_strict_description.message:
Do not use this feature unless you are ready to resolve the resulting problems yourself!
Are sub-domains of the same base domain different websites?
(Should a.example.com and b.example.com be considered different hosts?)
options_strict_description.description: Longer description of the options page checkbox that toggles whether different sub-domains of the same base domain will be considered the same host or not

options_allow_label.description: Label of the options page table that allows configuring Smart Referer policy exceptions

options_allow_description.message: Always allow referers to be passed from and to the given source and target hosts
options_allow_description.description: Longer description of the options page table that allows configuring Smart Referer policy exceptions

options_allow_heading_source.description: Heading of the options page policy exception table column that contains the source host names

options_allow_heading_destination.description: Heading of the options page policy exception table column that contains the destination host names

options_allow_explanation.message: Both source and target hosts may contain wildcards: *.example.com matches all domains at example.com. A single star character (*) means “any host”.
options_allow_explanation.description: Explanatory text that is displayed below the options page policy exception table

options_whitelist_label.description: Label of the section that specifies the locations from which the updated lists of policy exceptions are regularly downloaded

options_whitelist_sources_heading.description: Heading text of the table containing custom whitelist sources that may be configured by the user

options_whitelist_default_label.description: Label of the checkbox that enables/disables the usage of the default whitelist source (please do not modify the <a>-tag from the original!)

options_item_add.title.description: Tooltip of the "Add Item" button next to not-yet-added items in the options page policy exception table

options_item_remove.title.description: Tooltip of the "Remove Item" button next to existing items of the options page policy exception table

options_mode_label.description: Label of the drop-down menu for choosing which what to do if a referer is deemed as not being worthy of keeping

options_mode_self.message: Send the URL you're going to as referer (recommended)
options_mode_self.description: Rewrite Mode that changes disallowed referers to the URL of the site being visited

options_mode_direct.message: Send nothing as referer, looking like a direct hit
options_mode_direct.description: Rewrite Mode that just drops all disallowed referers

options_mode_user.description: Rewrite Mode that changes all disallowed referers to a user-provided value, that then may be entered into a text area field directly below the drop-down selection menu for picking the rewriting mode

options_mode_referer.title.description: Tooltip text of the text box that can be used to enter a custom referer if "Rewrite Mode" is set to that mode

icon_title_enabled.description: Text displayed in the browser action icon tooltip when request processing is being done

icon_title_disabled.description: Text displayed in the browser action icon tooltip when no request processing is being done

log_blocked_http.description: Message logged when a referer value has been blocked at the HTTP level

log_blocked_script.description: Message logged when a referer value has been blocked at the JavaScript level

log_whitelist_update_failed.message: Failed to retrieve whitelist source at “$URL$”:
log_whitelist_update_failed.description: Message logged when updating some whitelist source failed, the next line will contain the JavaScript exception

log_whitelist_update_finished.description: Message logged when updating of whitelists has finished
